name: Rollaround (itch)
description:
Hey,

this is a game for the #WeeklyGameJam 38.

Instructions:

- Roll through the level using the [W],[A],[S],[D] - Keys on your keyboard

- Collect checkpoints to get to a new stage

- Finish all stages and try to beat you best time!

Credits:

Music:  Where Are We?  by Artificial.Music

Thank you for playing!
